languages.text: "Тихо устраните главных возмутителей спокойствия, но не трогайте целые семейства. Надеюсь, такие меры отвратят остальных от дальнейшего бузотерства".

traits.locale_text: "Тихо устраните главных возмутителей спокойствия, но не трогайте целые семейства. Надеюсь, такие меры отвратят остальных от дальнейшего бузотерства".

languages.text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."
languages.original_text: "Тихо устраните главных возмутителей спокойствия, но не трогайте целые семейства. Надеюсь, такие меры отвратят остальных от дальнейшего бузотерства".

traits.locale_text: "Eliminate the most prominent firebrands quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from further rowdiness."
"Eliminate the most prominent firebrands quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from further rowdiness."
"Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."
"Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."
"Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

languages.text: “悄悄地干掉那些最不满的家伙，但不要威胁到整个家族。杀一儆百，这样剩下的人就不敢再惹麻烦了。”
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: “悄悄地干掉那些最不满的家伙，但不要威胁到整个家族。杀一儆百，这样剩下的人就不敢再惹麻烦了。”

languages.text: «Elimine a los indeseables más visibles en silencio, pero sin amenazar a familias enteras. Esperemos que estas medidas sean suficientes para evitar que los otros causen más problemas».
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Elimine a los indeseables más visibles en silencio, pero sin amenazar a familias enteras. Esperemos que estas medidas sean suficientes para evitar que los otros causen más problemas».

languages.text: 「一番目立っている不満分子を密かに粛清せよ。ただし一族全員を脅かしてはならない。うまくやれば、これだけで残りの者たちも大人しくなるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「一番目立っている不満分子を密かに粛清せよ。ただし一族全員を脅かしてはならない。うまくやれば、これだけで残りの者たちも大人しくなるだろう」

languages.text: "Eliminiert unauffällig die prominentesten Querulanten, aber bedroht nicht ganze Familien. Hoffentlich reicht das aus, um den Rest daran zu hindern, weiteren Ärger zu verursachen."
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Eliminiert unauffällig die prominentesten Querulanten, aber bedroht nicht ganze Familien. Hoffentlich reicht das aus, um den Rest daran zu ändern, weiteren Ärger zu verursachen."

languages.text: « Éliminez les principaux protestataires, mais procédez en toute discrétion, et ne faites pas disparaître des familles entières. Avec un peu de chance, ces mesures permettront d'éviter toute nouvelle contestation. »
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Éliminez les principaux protestataires, mais procédez en toute discrétion, et ne faites pas disparaître des familles entières. Avec un peu de chance, ces mesures permettront d'éviter toute nouvelle contestation. »

languages.text: "Hoşnutsuzluklarını dile getiren en ön plandaki kişileri sessizce ortadan kaldırtacak ama ailelere dokunmayacaksın. Umarım bu, kalanların sorun çıkarmasının önüne geçmeye yeter."
languages.original_text: "Eliminate the most prominent malcontents quietly, but do not threaten entire families. Hopefully these steps will be enough to keep the rest from causing any more trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Hoşnutsuzluklarını dile getiren en ön plandaki kişileri sessizce elemine edin ama ailelerin tamamına bir şey yapmayın. Umarım bunlar geri kalanların sorun çıkarmasının önüne geçmek için yeterli olur."
